bioAsHtml: Seasoned solution engineer at Xplore Group (Cronos) who just loves software engineering. Particularly interested in scalable architectures, eventing and virtualisation. Engaged in the field of experience-driven web applications, focusing on delivering personalised content. Currently working on two ambitious customer-facing platforms in Belgium (Telenet/Hubo).

acceptedTalks.title: Scaling the cube, from Monolith to Micro-service mayhem.
